name: Car Driving School
description:
Get behind the wheel and start your lessons in the most realistic city driving school sim around! This is a game that will not only experiment your skills in controlling the car but also request parking skill

Features:
• Smooth and realistic car handling
• Tow Type of Steering Controls
• More than 10 challenging levels
• Free Ride mode
• Detailed vehicle interiors
• Realistic damage system
• Tilt steering, buttons and touch steering wheel
